alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 6:09PM CST until November 29 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 609 PM CST, A tornado was reported near Columbia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic storm will be near... Liddieville around 620 PM CST. Jigger around 625 PM CST. Winnsboro around 630 PM CST. Crowville around 640 PM CST. Bakers around 650 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Gilbert and Baskin. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
